preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 240 g of Cadmium (Cd). 
 2. Measure 60 g of Gadolinium (Gd). 
 3. Weigh 240 g of Indium (In). 
 4. Measure 180 g of Praseodymium (Pr). 
 5. Combine all the ingredients in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 6. Use a mechanical mixer to ensure thorough mixing without introducing contaminants.
